casebody.data:
(October 15, 1968)

(Republished)

Ideal Leasing Corporation Respondent v. Peter F. Mallon, Inc., Defendant-Appellant and Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellant. National Cash Register Company, Third-Party Defendant-Respondent.

Orders entered on April 8, 1968 and April 1, 1968, unanimously affirmed, with $50 costs and disbursements to the respondents. The order of this court entered on October 10, 1968 [30 A D 2d 1054], is vacated. No opinion. Concur— Stevens, J. P., Tilzer, McGivern, McNally and Macken, JJ.
